title: Bacon Broccoli Salad
directions: Trim and cut broccoli into bit sized pieces.
Mix the ingredients for the dressing.
Assemble before serving and garnish with your favorite topping.
ingredients: 2 pounds broccoli florets (about two big heads and stalks cut and trimmed)
3 tablespoons Swerve (or powdered erythritol or stevia glycerite to taste)
